verses.verse: <S%H428>"These<s%> are the <S%H2706>statutes<s%> and the <S%H4941>judgments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you shall <S%H6213>carefully<s%> <S%H8104>observe<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of your fathers, has <S%H1>given<s%> you to <S%H5414>possess<s%> as <S%H3423>long<s%> <S%H3605><s%> as you <S%H3117>live<s%> on the <S%H2416>earth.<s%>

"You shall utterly destroy <S%H6>all<s%> the <S%H6>places<s%> <S%H3605>where<s%> <S%H4725><s%> the <S%H834>nations<s%> <S%H8033>whom<s%> you shall <S%H1471>dispossess<s%> <S%H834>serve<s%> their <S%H3423>gods,<s%> on the <S%H5647>high<s%> <S%H430>mountains<s%> and on the <S%H7311>hills<s%> and <S%H2022>under<s%> <S%H1389>every<s%> <S%H8478>green<s%> <S%H3605>tree.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H5422>tear<s%> <S%H5422>down<s%> their <S%H4196>altars<s%> and <S%H7665>smash<s%> their [sacred] <S%H4676>pillars<s%> and <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H842>Asherim<s%> with <S%H784>fire,<s%> and you shall <S%H1438>cut<s%> <S%H1438>down<s%> the <S%H6456>engraved<s%> <S%H6456>images<s%> of their <S%H430>gods,<s%> and you shall obliterate their <S%H6>name<s%> from that <S%H8034>place.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H6213>act<s%> <S%H3651>like<s%> <S%H3651>this<s%> toward the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

"But you shall <S%H1875>seek<s%> [the] <S%H3068>[Lord<s%>] at the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the Lord your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> to <S%H7760>establish<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> for His <S%H7931>dwelling,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H935>come.<s%>

"And <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> your <S%H4643>tithes,<s%> the <S%H8641>contribution<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> your <S%H5088>votive<s%> <S%H5088>offerings,<s%> your <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> and the first-born of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and of your <S%H6629>flock.<s%>

<S%H8033>"There<s%> also you and your <S%H1004>households<s%> shall <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3027>undertakings<s%> <S%H9303><s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H1288>blessed<s%> you.

"You shall not <S%H6213>do<s%> at <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>what<s%> we are <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H3117>today,<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> [doing] <S%H3605>whatever<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in his own <S%H5869>eyes;<s%>

for you have not as <S%H6258>yet<s%> <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H4496>resting<s%> <S%H4496>place<s%> and the <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is <S%H5414>giving<s%> you.

"When you <S%H5674>cross<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan<s%> and <S%H3427>live<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> is giving you to <S%H5157>inherit,<s%> and He <S%H5117>gives<s%> you <S%H5117>rest<s%> from <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H340>enemies<s%> <S%H5439>around<s%> [you] so that you <S%H3427>live<s%> in <S%H983>security,<s%>

then it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> about that the <S%H4725>place<s%> in <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H977>choose<s%> for His <S%H8034>name<s%> to <S%H7931>dwell,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you: your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> and your <S%H2077>sacrifices,<s%> your <S%H4643>tithes<s%> and the <S%H8641>contribution<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H977>choice<s%> <S%H5088>votive<s%> <S%H5088>offerings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you will <S%H5088>vow<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> your <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H519><s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is within your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H3588>since<s%> he <S%H369>has<s%> <S%H369>no<s%> <S%H2506>portion<s%> or <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> with you.
"Be <S%H8104>careful<s%> that you do not <S%H5927>offer<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings<s%> in <S%H3605>every<s%> [cultic] <S%H4725>place<s%> you <S%H7200>see,<s%>

but in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H977>chooses<s%> in <S%H259>one<s%> of your <S%H7626>tribes,<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H5927>offer<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and <S%H8033>there<s%> you shall <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> that I <S%H6680>command<s%> you.

<S%H7534>"However,<s%> you may <S%H2076>slaughter<s%> and <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat<s%> within <S%H3605>any<s%> of your <S%H8179>gates,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> you <S%H185>desire,<s%> according to the <S%H1293>blessing<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> you; the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of it, as of the <S%H6643>gazelle<s%> and the <S%H354>deer.<s%>
<S%H7534>"Only<s%> you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood;<s%> you are to <S%H8210>pour<s%> it out on the <S%H776>ground<s%> like <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"You are not <S%H3201>allowed<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates<s%> the <S%H4643>tithe<s%> of your <S%H1715>grain,<s%> or <S%H8492>new<s%> <S%H8492>wine,<s%> or <S%H3323>oil,<s%> or the first-born of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> or <S%H6629>flock,<s%> or <S%H3605>any<s%> of your <S%H5088>votive<s%> <S%H5088>offerings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you <S%H5087>vow,<s%> or your <S%H5071>freewill<s%> <S%H5071>offerings,<s%> or the <S%H8641>contribution<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

"But you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> them <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> will <S%H977>choose,<s%> you and your <S%H1121>son<s%> and <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and your <S%H5650>male<s%> and <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H519><s%> and the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> is within your <S%H8179>gates;<s%> and you shall <S%H8055>rejoice<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> in <S%H3605>all<s%> your <S%H3027>undertakings.<s%> <S%H9303><s%>
"Be <S%H8104>careful<s%> that you do not <S%H5800>forsake<s%> the <S%H3881>Levite<s%> as <S%H3605>long<s%> <S%H3117><s%> as you <S%H3117>live<s%> in your <S%H127>land.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7337>extends<s%> your <S%H1366>border<s%> as He has <S%H1696>promised<s%> you, and you <S%H559>say,<s%> 'I will <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat,<s%>' <S%H3588>because<s%> you <S%H183>desire<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat,<s%> [then] you may <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1320>meat,<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> you <S%H185>desire.<s%>

<S%H3588>"If<s%> the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H977>chooses<s%> to <S%H7760>put<s%> His <S%H8034>name<s%> is too <S%H7368>far<s%> from you, then you may <S%H2076>slaughter<s%> of your <S%H1241>herd<s%> and <S%H6629>flock<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> you, as I have <S%H6680>commanded<s%> you; and you may <S%H398>eat<s%> within your <S%H8179>gates<s%> <S%H3605>whatever<s%> you <S%H185>desire.<s%>

<S%H389>"Just<s%> <S%H9201><s%> as a <S%H6643>gazelle<s%> or a <S%H354>deer<s%> is <S%H398>eaten,<s%> <S%H3651>so<s%> you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> it; the <S%H2931>unclean<s%> and the <S%H2889>clean<s%> <S%H9191>alike<s%> may <S%H398>eat<s%> of it.

<S%H7534>"Only<s%> be <S%H2388>sure<s%> not to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> for the <S%H1818>blood<s%> is the <S%H5315>life,<s%> and you shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> with the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>
"You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> it; you shall <S%H8210>pour<s%> it out on the <S%H776>ground<s%> like <S%H4325>water.<s%>

"You shall not <S%H398>eat<s%> it, in <S%H4616>order<s%> that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you, for you will be <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H3477>what<s%> is <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

<S%H7534>"Only<s%> your <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you may <S%H1961>have<s%> and your <S%H5088>votive<s%> <S%H5088>offerings,<s%> you shall <S%H5375>take<s%> and <S%H935>go<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H977>chooses.<s%>

"And you shall <S%H6213>offer<s%> your <S%H5930>burnt<s%> <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood,<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God;<s%> and the <S%H1818>blood<s%> of your <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> shall be <S%H8210>poured<s%> out on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and you shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

"Be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, in <S%H4616>order<s%> that it may be <S%H3190>well<s%> with you and your <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> you <S%H5704>forever,<s%> <S%H5769><s%> for you will be <S%H6213>doing<s%> <S%H2896>what<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%> and <S%H3477>right<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God.<s%>

<S%H3588>"When<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H3772>cuts<s%> <S%H3772>off<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> you are <S%H935>going<s%> in to <S%H3423>dispossess,<s%> and you <S%H3423>dispossess<s%> them and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in their <S%H776>land,<s%>

<S%H8104>beware<s%> that you are not <S%H5367>ensnared<s%> to <S%H310>follow<s%> them, <S%H310>after<s%> they are <S%H8045>destroyed<s%> <S%H4480>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, and that you do not <S%H1875>inquire<s%> after their <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H351>'How<s%> do <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5647>serve<s%> their <S%H430>gods,<s%> that I <S%H1571>also<s%> may <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H3651>likewise<s%>?'

"You shall not <S%H6213>behave<s%> <S%H3651>thus<s%> toward the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> for <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H8441>abominable<s%> <S%H8441>act<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H8130>hates<s%> they have <S%H6213>done<s%> for their <S%H430>gods;<s%> for they <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H8313>burn<s%> their <S%H1121>sons<s%> and <S%H1323>daughters<s%> in the <S%H784>fire<s%> to their <S%H430>gods.<s%>

<S%H3605>"Whatever<s%> <S%H1697><s%> <S%H834><s%> I <S%H6680>command<s%> you, you shall be <S%H8104>careful<s%> to <S%H6213>do;<s%> you shall not <S%H3254>add<s%> to <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1639>take<s%> <S%H1639>away<s%> from it.
